reference.shortdesc: Related links are a group of references to other topics or external information related to the current topic.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: Related links usually are displayed at the end of the topic, although some Web-based help systems might display them in a separate navigation frame.
Links specified within the related-links element typically are displayed together with any links that are generated based on the map context.
PDF or print-oriented output commonly ignores hierarchical links such as those with roles of ancestor, parent, child, descendant, next, previous, or sibling.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , format, scope, type, role, and otherrole.
